# Engram - Memory Infrastructure for AI Agents
> Long-term memory that makes AI agents smarter over time.

Engram is open-source memory infrastructure for AI agents. It provides persistent memory storage, semantic search via multi-model ensemble embeddings, knowledge graphs, and automatic memory consolidation (Dream Cycle).

## Key Features
- Multi-model ensemble search (OpenAI, Cohere, or local models)
- Knowledge graph with entity extraction
- Dream Cycle (automatic memory consolidation)
- Memory layers (Identity, Project, Session, Task)
- Fog Index (memory health scoring)

## Links
- Website: https://openengram.ai
- Dashboard: https://app.openengram.ai
- API: https://api.openengram.ai
- GitHub: https://github.com/heybeaux/engram
- Docs: https://app.openengram.ai/docs

## Pricing
- Self-hosted: Free, unlimited
- Cloud: Starter $9/mo, Pro $39/mo, Scale $99/mo
